#summary Step-by-step installation instructions for the Blur API

=== Download and Installation ===

*Step 1:* You'll need to download and install the core libraries that all the packages require:

 # BlurCore

*Step 2:* Next you can download and install any additional packages that suit your needs

 # Py3dsMax   - Integrates Python and PyQt into the 3dsMax application
 # Blur3dsMax - Scripts and Tools that help make 3dsMax better (includes Py3dsMax)

 # PySoftimage   - Integrates PyQt as a GUI framework into Softimage
 # BlurSoftimage - Scripts and Tools that help make Softimage better (includes PySoftimage)
